00050 // The abstract base class for all cell display objects
00051 
00066 class QicsCellDisplay: public Qics {
00067 public:
00068     QicsCellDisplay();
00069 
00073     virtual ~QicsCellDisplay();
00074 
00085     virtual void displayCell(QicsGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00086                  const QicsDataItem *itm,
00087                  const QRect &rect, QPainter *painter) = 0;
00088 
00101     virtual void startEdit(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00102                const QicsDataItem *itm) = 0;
00103 
00114     virtual void moveEdit(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00115               const QRect &rect) = 0;
00116 
00123     virtual void hideEdit(QicsScreenGrid *grid) = 0;
00124 
00133     virtual void endEdit(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col) = 0;
00134 
00145     virtual bool handleMouseEvent(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00146                   QMouseEvent *me);
00147 
00158     virtual bool handleKeyEvent(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00159                 QKeyEvent *ke);
00160 
00169     virtual QSize sizeHint(QicsGrid *grid, int row, int col,
00170                const QicsDataItem *itm) = 0;
00171 
00176     virtual bool editWhenCurrent(void) const = 0;
00177 
00182     inline virtual bool needsVisibilityNotification(void) const { return false; }
00183 
00192     virtual bool isEmpty(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00193              const QicsDataItem *itm) const = 0;
00194 
00204     virtual QString tooltipText(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00205                 const QicsDataItem *itm, const QRect &rect) const;
00206 
00207 protected:
00221     virtual void drawBackground(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00222                 const QRect &rect, const QColorGroup &cg,
00223                 QPainter *painter,
00224                 bool is_current = false, bool is_selected = false);
00225 
00238     virtual void drawBorder(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col,
00239                 const QRect &rect, const QColorGroup &cg,
00240                 QPainter *painter,
00241                 bool is_current = false, bool is_selected = false);
00242 
00254     virtual bool isCellSelected(QicsGridInfo *info, int row, int col);
00255 
00267     virtual QColorGroup cellColorGroup(QicsGridInfo *info,
00268                        int row, int col,
00269                        bool for_printer = false);
00270 
00283     virtual QRect displayableCellArea(QicsGridInfo *ginfo,
00284                       int row, int col,
00285                       const QRect &cr_full, 
00286                       bool consider_margin = true,
00287                       bool consider_border = true) const;
00288 
00289 protected:
00290     QicsCell     *myCell;
00291     QicsRow      *myRow;
00292     QicsColumn   *myColumn;
00293     QicsMainGrid *myGrid;
00294 };

00313 // An abstract class for all cell display objects that draw each cell,
00314 // and use a single entry widget
00315 
00316 class QicsNoWidgetCellDisplay: public QicsCellDisplay {
00317 public:
00322     QicsNoWidgetCellDisplay();
00323 
00327     virtual ~QicsNoWidgetCellDisplay();
00328 
00332     virtual void startEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col,
00333                const QicsDataItem *);
00337     virtual void moveEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col, const QRect &rect);
00338 
00342     virtual void endEdit(QicsScreenGrid *grid, int row, int col);
00343 
00347     virtual void hideEdit(QicsScreenGrid *);
00348 
00349     inline virtual bool editWhenCurrent(void) const { return false; }
00350 };

00370 // An abstract class for all cell display objects that draw each cell,
00371 // and use a single entry widget
00372 
00373 class QicsMovableEntryWidgetCellDisplay: public QicsCellDisplay {
00374 public:
00379     QicsMovableEntryWidgetCellDisplay();
00380 
00384     virtual ~QicsMovableEntryWidgetCellDisplay();
00385 
00386     virtual void moveEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col, const QRect &rect);
00387     virtual void endEdit(QicsScreenGrid *, int row, int col);
00388     virtual void hideEdit(QicsScreenGrid *);
00389 
00390     inline virtual bool editWhenCurrent(void) const { return true; }
00391 
00392 protected:
00393 // A helper class for QicsMovableEntryWidgetCellDisplay
00394 
00406     class QicsEntryWidgetInfo {
00407     public:
00408     QicsEntryWidgetInfo() { myWidget = 0; myGrid = 0; myItem = 0;
00409                             myRow = -1; myCol = -1; }
00410     ~QicsEntryWidgetInfo() { delete myItem; }
00411 
00415     inline QWidget *widget(void) const { return myWidget; }
00419     inline void setWidget(QWidget *w) { myWidget = w; }
00423     inline QicsScreenGrid *grid(void) const { return myGrid; }
00427     inline void setGrid(QicsScreenGrid *grid) { myGrid = grid; }
00431     inline int row(void) const { return myRow; }
00435     inline void setRow(int row) { myRow = row; }
00439     inline int column(void) const { return myCol; }
00443     inline void setColumn(int col) { myCol = col; }
00447     inline QicsDataItem *item(void) const { return myItem; }
00451     inline void setItem(QicsDataItem *item) { delete myItem; myItem = item; }
00452 
00453     protected:
00454     QWidget *myWidget;
00455     QicsScreenGrid *myGrid;
00456     int myRow;
00457     int myCol;
00458     QicsDataItem *myItem;
00459     };
00460 
00461     typedef QPtrList<QicsEntryWidgetInfo> QicsEntryWidgetInfoPL;
00462 
00468     virtual QWidget *newEntryWidget(QicsScreenGrid *grid) = 0;
00472     QicsEntryWidgetInfo *getInfoFromGrid(QicsScreenGrid *grid);
00476     QicsEntryWidgetInfo *getInfoFromEntry(const QWidget *widget);
00477 
00487     virtual QRect entryWidgetRect(QicsGridInfo *ginfo, int row, int col,
00488                   QRect cell_rect);
00489 
00491     QicsEntryWidgetInfoPL myEntryList;
00492 };
